# Api Go

This project was develop in GoLand 2020.3 (Jetbrains)

## Prerequsites
Use Microsoft Terminal and check:

`go version`

![Go not install](/doc/img/img1.png "Go not install locally")

GOROOT:

SDK Go Path

GOPATH:

Project Path


Build

`go build file.go`

Run

`go run file.go`

or

`./file`

Add Github Actions v5
